universum.studios.android.fragment

Class WebFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Fragment
      • universum.studios.android.fragment.BaseFragment
        • universum.studios.android.fragment.ActionBarFragment
          • universum.studios.android.fragment.WebFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentCallbacks, ComponentCallbacks2, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, BackPressWatcher, ViewClickWatcher

    public class WebFragment
extends ActionBarFragment
    An ActionBarFragment implementation that allows to show a web content within a WebView. This fragment creates WebView as its root view when onCreateView(LayoutInflater, ViewGroup, Bundle) is called. That WebView is used to present the web content supplied to this web fragment.

    The desired web content may be specified through WebFragment.WebOptions when creating new instance of WebFragment via newInstance(WebOptions) or when you have access to already visible and showing web fragment via loadContent(String).

    Web content types

    Following content types are supported as content that may be loaded into WebView:
    • URL

      http://www.google.com

    • HTML 
       <h6>Content heading</h6>
 <p>
 Content paragraph.
 </p>
    • FILE

      file://PATH_TO_THE_FILE_WITH_WEB_CONTENT

    Accepted annotations

    • @WebContent [class]

      If this annotation is presented, the content specified via this annotation will be loaded into WebView of an instance of annotated WebFragment sub-class.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    WebFragment.OnWebContentLoadingListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  WebFragment.ContentType
      Defines an annotation for determining set of allowed content type flags for onLoadContent(String, int) method.
      static interface  WebFragment.OnWebContentLoadingListener
      Simple listener for WebFragment with callbacks fired whenever loading process of a specific web url was started/finished.
      static class  WebFragment.WebOptions
      Simple class specifying options for WebFragment like WebFragment.WebOptions.content(String) WebFragment.WebOptions.javaScriptEnabled(boolean).

        public static boolean isValidWebUrl(@Nullable
                                    String url)
        Checks whether the given url is valid and can be loaded into web view.
        Parameters:
        url - Url to check.
        Returns:
        True if url matches valid web URL format, false otherwise.

      • setOnWebContentLoadingListener

        public void setOnWebContentLoadingListener(@Nullable
                                           WebFragment.OnWebContentLoadingListener listener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when loading process of the current content into web view starts or finishes.
        Parameters:
        listener - The desired listener callback. May be null to clear the current one.

      • notifyLoadingStarted

        protected void notifyLoadingStarted(@NonNull
                                    String webUrl)
        Called to notify, that loading process of the specified webUrl just started.

        By default this will dispatch WebFragment.OnWebContentLoadingListener.onLoadingStarted(String) callback to the current OnWebContentLoadingListener listener.

        Parameters:
        webUrl - Web url which is currently being loaded into the current web view.

      • notifyLoadingFinished

        protected void notifyLoadingFinished(@NonNull
                                     String webUrl)
        Called to notify, that loading process of the specified webUrl was finished.

        By default, this will dispatch WebFragment.OnWebContentLoadingListener.onLoadingFinished(String) callback to the current OnWebContentLoadingListener listener.

        Parameters:
        webUrl - Web url which was currently loaded into the current web view.

      • loadContent

        public boolean loadContent(@Nullable
                           String content)
        Loads the given content into the WebView of this web fragment instance.
        Parameters:
        content - Content to load. May be a raw HTML, web URL or path to a FILE with HTML content.
        Returns:
        True if content was loaded, false if it was prepared for loading and will be loaded in the feature when WebView is ready.
        See Also:
        getContent()

      • onLoadContent

        protected void onLoadContent(@Nullable
                             String content,
                             int type)
        Invoked whenever loadContent(String) is called and this fragment is ready (READY means after onActivityCreated(Bundle) was called) to load that specific content or from onActivityCreated(Bundle) when this fragment is being first time created.
        Parameters:
        content - Content to load. This can be a raw HTML, web URL or a path to FILE.
        type - A type of the specified content. One of flags CONTENT_EMPTY, CONTENT_HTML, CONTENT_URL or CONTENT_FILE.

      • getContent

        @Nullable
public String getContent()
        Returns the current content that is loaded or prepared to load into the web view of this web fragment instance.
        Returns:
        Current content. This can be a raw HTML or web URL or a FILE path.
        See Also:
        loadContent(String)

        public void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle state)
